meta.notes: Add peer-reviewed sources here as you curate them. Each dx key references citations by id.

citations.title: Horner syndrome pharmacologic testing (apraclonidine): review and practical considerations
citations.summary: Apraclonidine is commonly used to confirm Horner syndrome; timing and false negatives can occur early after onset.

citations.title: Third nerve palsy evaluation, pupil involvement, and imaging considerations
citations.summary: Discusses etiologies of third nerve palsy and reasons imaging is often recommended depending on presentation.

citations.title: Dilute pilocarpine testing in Adie/tonic pupil
citations.summary: Describes dilute pilocarpine response patterns in tonic pupils and practical testing pearls.
